name: Alone at Dusk
description:
You find yourself alone in a maze at night, with only a lantern, low on fuel, to guide your path. But be wary, for dead ends and large cliffs aren't the only dangers abound.

Reach the end of every stage by finding and walking to the x. Turning off your lantern will make the walls disappear, but allow monsters to attack you! Pick fuel up off the ground before they get too close so you can turn your lantern back on and scare them away.

WASD to move, Space to turn on/off your lantern

This game was made as part NOKIA 3310 Jam 3. The theme of ON/OFF lead us to a character with a lantern he could turn on and off at will.

Team Members:
Nick Browning-Coding, Level Design
Nick Vasi-Character and Level art

Any feedback in the comments is greatly appreciated!
